text: Bretonnières railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Bretonnières, in the Swiss canton of Vaud. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Simplon line of Swiss Federal Railways and is served by local trains only. == Services == The following services stop at Bretonnières: * RER Vaud: : hourly service between and ; one daily round-trip continues from Villeneuve to . == References == == External links == * * Category:Railway stations in the canton of Vaud Category:Swiss Federal Railways stations
title: Bretonnières railway station
